name: Alter Emotions
description:
Hola!

I come to show you a future project of my game "Alter Emotions".

This game could be described as a 2d metroidvania with "good" graphics (In my opinion). The animations are created frame by frame. At the moment it does not contain audio. 

I hope you enjoy the experience (although at the moment it is quite short). As the game is updated I will upload new versions of it. All the best. I hope you like the idea.
